skills.name: High-Efficiency Freezing Module
skills.description:
Passive: Slows enemies within the attack range of this unit and drones every 3 seconds for 1 seconds; 
Active: Instead of slowing, binds targets for 2 seconds and retreats all deployed drones after this effect ends

skills.name: Laser Mining Module
skills.description:
Passive: Drones may be deployed on melee tiles, dealing single-target Arts damage. 
Active: Magallan and her drones gain +150 ASPD, and drones gain AoE attacks. Retreats all drones after this effect ends.

skills.name: Armed Combat Module
skills.description:
Passive: Drones may be deployed on ranged tiles, dealing AoE physical damage. 
Active: Magallan and her drones gain +150% ATK, and increases the AoE of drones' attacks. Retreats all drones after this effect ends.

talents.name: Support Drone - Soaring Dragon
talents.description: Can use up to 5 drones that do not block (max 3 deployed at once). Drones’ effect changes based upon Skill.

talents.name: Optical Refraction Accessories
talents.description: Drones cannot be targeted by enemy attacks within 22 <@ba.talpu>(+2)</> seconds of deployment.
